com.mareksebera.dilbert
Class DilbertActivity

java.lang.Object

                      com.mareksebera.dilbert.DilbertActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnActionModeFinishedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnActionModeStartedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnCreatePanelMenuListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnMenuItemSelectedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnPreparePanelListener
public class DilbertActivity
extends com.actionbarsherlock.app.SherlockActivity

This code is roughly optimized and for sure could be improved. I just needed better version of Dilbert reader than "Quick Dilbert Reader", so I wrote one myself. Links to images are parsed from dilbert website directly, as I haven't found any better solution. Supports caching images (Universal Image Loader feature) and caching parsing
